item.title: Scaling smarter: Startup stories from Le Wagon Online Demo Day
item.description:
Missed the Growth Marketing online Demo Day? Discover how startups like Clay, Et Après, Moneycare, and Rotary are using marketing innovation to scale faster and smarter—with real case studies and videos.

L’article Scaling smarter: Startup stories from Le Wagon Online Demo Day est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: Breaking Barriers: Women in AI – A panel discussion
item.description:
Last fall, Le Wagon Montreal hosted a dynamic panel discussion on Women in AI, featuring Stefania Pecore – AI R&D Director and Ambassador for Women Techmakers, Women in AI, and Women in Games, and Gabrielle Hurtubise-Radet – Principal Manager of Startup Programs at Mila.
The discussion explored breaking barriers, navigating biases in AI, and empowering women to build careers in technology. The panelists shared personal experiences, insights, and practical advice for overcoming imposter syndrome and making an impact in AI.

L’article Breaking Barriers: Women in AI – A panel discussion est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: Growth Marketing Demo Day: showcasing innovation and impact
item.description:
Le Wagon’s Growth Marketing Bootcamp Demo Day showcased innovative projects from our graduates, highlighting creativity, strategy, and real-world impact.

L’article Growth Marketing Demo Day: showcasing innovation and impact est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: “Code, Baby, Code!” – Why Europe Must Invest in Developers to Leverage AI
item.description:
In the AI era, should entrepreneurs still invest in developers? In this article, Boris Paillard, Co-Founder and Executive Chairman of Le Wagon, breaks down why coding remains essential—even as No-Code and AI-powered tools evolve.

L’article “Code, Baby, Code!” – Why Europe Must Invest in Developers to Leverage AI est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: The ultimate Learning Guide: How to prepare and thrive in a tech bootcamp
item.description:
Is a bootcamp too intensive or complicated for you? Le Wagon’s learning guide gives you the answers and a clear roadmap to success. From preparation tips to career advice, discover what to expect and how to thrive. Download the full guide now!

L’article The ultimate Learning Guide: How to prepare and thrive in a tech bootcamp est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: Essential skills for the future of work: Insights from the Future of Jobs Report 2025
item.description:
The World Economic Forum's Future of Jobs Report 2025 highlights the skills shaping the future workforce. Analytical thinking, resilience, technological literacy, creative problem-solving, and leadership are essential for success in a rapidly evolving job market. With nearly 39% of current skills expected to become outdated by 2030, workers and employers must prioritize adaptability, upskilling, and lifelong learning. Discover how to prepare for the challenges and opportunities of the future.

L’article Essential skills for the future of work: Insights from the Future of Jobs Report 2025 est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: Quotanda: Flexible, interest-free payment plans for Le Wagon students
item.description:
Le Wagon now offers flexible, interest-free payment plans through Quotanda, empowering students to spread their tuition over 12 or 18 months. Say goodbye to financial barriers and start your journey to a tech career today!

L’article Quotanda: Flexible, interest-free payment plans for Le Wagon students est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.description:
From visa rules to tips for accommodation, here is our ultimate 2025 Tokyo travel guide!

item.title: The Virtual Campus you wish you had: what is Gathertown?
item.description:
Tired of lifeless online trainings? At Le Wagon, we’ve swapped the dull virtual classroom for Gathertown—a vibrant, 90s-style campus where avatars explore, chat, and learn together. It’s a digital world that brings spontaneity back to online learning, making it feel less like a chore and more like a shared adventure.

L’article The Virtual Campus you wish you had: what is Gathertown? est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: HelloWork subsidy: Three more years!
item.description:
Our Web Development and Data Science & AI bootcamps have just been re-certified by the Ministry of Health, Labor, and Welfare under the Specialized Practice Education and Training Benefits Program. For at least another 3 years, students will be able to apply to receive a refund for up to 70% of their tuition fee!

L’article HelloWork subsidy: Three more years! est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: Women in Tech & Le Wagon scholarship
item.description:
Le Wagon is partnering with Women in Tech, to support the mission to empower 5 million women and girls by 2030. Le Wagon will be offering a total of €200,000 in scholarships on our globally recognised training courses to make tech education more accessible and promote diversity in the industry.

L’article Women in Tech & Le Wagon scholarship est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.

item.title: How to finance your tech education with Le Wagon UK
item.description:
In an interview with João, the Global Sales and Admissions Coordinator at Le Wagon, we delve into the dynamic world of tech education and financing. From our core mission to accessible financing options, João sheds light on how Le Wagon is reshaping the way individuals embark on their tech career journeys.

L’article How to finance your tech education with Le Wagon UK est apparu en premier sur Blog Le Wagon.
